author: frmeier
body:
Two misalignment scenarios were added:
- TrackerCSA14Scenario: Used for preparing the 50 ns scenario. See https://twiki.cern.ch/twiki/bin/viewauth/CMS/TkAl1402 for details.
- LS1BPixRepairScenario: Prepared for realignment studies after the LS1 BPix repair. See https://indico.cern.ch/event/337181/, talk by Ekaterina Avdeeva, for details

This PR needs to be backported to the other versions we currently use for alignment.
title: Update misali scenarios
